notes: Does not work against wards ( Plague Ward, Mass Serpent Ward, Death Ward).
Does not reduce physical damage from spells, except from Moon Glaives and The Swarm.
For more details, see Damage Block.
Treats illusions as heroes and creep-heroes as creeps.
abilities.description: Gives a 100% chance to block 30 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 20 damage on ranged. Has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.

description: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
info: Poor Man's Shields are fully sharable.
